mapper.insert: insert into tb_auth_number (user_seq, auth_text, auth_created_date) values( (select user_seq from tb_user where user_id=#{userId} LIMIT 1), #{authText}, now() )
mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_auth_number where auth_text=#{authText} and user_seq=(select user_seq from tb_user where user_id=#{userId})
